mapper.update:
UPDATE so_enquiry
enquiry_code = #{enquiryCode},
enquiry_status = #{enquiryStatus},
enquiry_audit_status = #{enquiryAuditStatus},
affirm_status = #{affirmStatus},
product_id = #{productId},
product_name = #{productName},
product_price = #{productPrice},
product_num = #{productNum},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
c_id = #{cId},
c_name = #{cName},
ask_time = #{askTime},
offer_time = #{offerTime},
enquiry_remark_user = #{enquiryRemarkUser},
enquiry_remark_c = #{enquiryRemarkC},
platform_id = #{platformId},
audit_reason = #{auditReason},
link_phone = #{linkPhone},
cancel_reason_user = #{cancelReasonUser},
cancel_reason_c = #{cancelReasonC},
order_code = #{orderCode},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
merchant_name = #{merchantName},
enquiry_remark_c_user = #{enquiryRemarkCUser},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
